name: Umbra (Conk)
description:
Kill some spiders.

Equip some weapons.

That's about it.

  • Movement: Arrow Keys or Left Stick
  • Sprint: Hold Left Shift/Space or ‘A/Cross’
  • Attack: Hold/Press ‘Z’ or Right Trigger
  • Take/Drop item: Hold ‘V’ or ‘Y/Triangle’
  • Inventory: A/D or Bumpers
  • Equipment: X/C or D-PAD

Download game for controller support, otherwise it'll crash.
